dict.acceptation: 在…的时候；在…期间，当…之时；其间；

sent.orig: Recent productivity figures look good, but these figures always fall during slumps and rise during recoveries.
sent.trans: 近来的生产率数字看上去不错，但是这些数据总是随着衰退而下降，随着复苏而上升。

sent.orig: During the summer months some small animals usually store up nuts to eat during the winter.
sent.trans: 一些小动物通常在夏季储存坚果以备冬季食用。

sent.orig: B. During the heart stage leaves are initiated; and during the torpedo stage axis elongation occurs.
sent.trans: 心阶段启动叶；并在鱼雷阶段轴伸长率发生。

sent.orig: Quizzes are administered during lecture sessions, except for two held during Finals Week each semester.
sent.trans: 除了两节于各学期末最后一周之测验外，随堂考将于课堂中执行。

sent.orig: Regulators can lower capital ratios during down turns and raise them during good economic times.
sent.trans: 监管者可以在经济低迷时下调资本充足率，在经济景气时提高资本充足率。
